entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:54 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
